messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/2005 8:32:36 AM Central Standard Time,
tuckervill2@... writes:

There's a good story about the time the river ran backwards in William
Faulkner's _Old Man_



~~~

I mean, William Faulkner's _Old Man_ is a good story about the time the
river ran backwards.

Better.

Karen

www.badchair.net
